title: Online Programming Fundamentals Course for Non-Major Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Non-computer major professionals (e.g., architecture) acquiring foundational programming skills required in the field.

learning_goals: Cultivation of basic algorithm design skills using Python syntax through 4C-ID model-based online learning
Mastery of programming problem-solving procedures (analysis-design-implementation-testing) through 10 real-case projects
Achieve over 80% proficiency in diagnosing and correcting coding practice errors via formative assessments in learning management systems (LMS)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
